workshoptitle: Application Continuity made simple with Universal Connection Pool

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Provision the RAC database
tutorials.description: In this lab we will create a 2-node RAC database.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Provision the client machine
tutorials.description: In this lab, you will provision the client machine.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Setup the Application Environment
tutorials.description: In this Lab you will configure the network and create RAC services.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Simple Application Continuity
tutorials.description: In this lab, you will create a simple demo application with a connection pool to a RAC cluster.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Application Continuity for Planned Maintenance
tutorials.description: This lab will show you how to use database services for planned maintenance with Application Continuity.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
